basic_info.name: Abhinav Paidisetti
basic_info.title: Computer Science and Business Systems Student
basic_info.summary: B.Tech 3rd Year Computer Science and Business Systems student with strong expertise in AI/ML and web development. Actively involved in AI research and application development. Currently working as an SDE Intern at Wizcom Technologies and serving as a coordinator at SALVO, SASTRA's AI club.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Business Systems

experience_details.title: SDE Intern
experience_details.description: Developed a full-stack Stock Alert App using React, Flask, MySQL, and Pandas to automate stock price monitoring, trigger alerts, and data analysis.

experience_details.title: Research Intern
experience_details.description: Trained a YOLOv8 model for AOI Detection and analyzed driver attention spans using Gaze Parameters.
achievements: Achieved 93% accuracy in attention detection model
Generated literature review and wrote batch scripts to automate 75% of tasks

experience_details.title: Technical Intern
experience_details.description: Worked on SAP (ERP Model) – Data Archiving (SARA & SARI modules).
achievements: Achieved 100% accuracy in testing and deployment

experience_details.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience_details.description: Worked as a Machine Learning Intern, analyzing datasets and developing prediction models.

experience_details.title: Coordinator
experience_details.description: Serving as a coordinator for SALVO, the official AI club of SASTRA University. Organizing workshops, hackathons, and technical sessions on AI/ML technologies.
achievements: Introduced students to cutting-edge AI tools including Perplexity

experience_details.title: Co-founder
experience_details.description: Co-founding a strategy consulting club on campus to help students develop business strategy and consulting skills.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built with modern web technologies.

projects.name: ML Prediction & Classification Models
projects.description: Developed various machine learning models for prediction and classification tasks, applying different algorithms and techniques to improve accuracy and performance.
highlights: Implemented various classification algorithms with high accuracy

projects.name: Computer Vision Applications
projects.description: Created deep learning applications for image detection and recognition using computer vision techniques and neural network architectures.
highlights: Developed object detection and image recognition systems

projects.name: LLM Exploration Projects
projects.description: Currently exploring Large Language Models, including fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and application development.
highlights: Actively researching and implementing LLM-based solutions

achievements_details.title: Hackathon Winner
achievements_details.description: Won ₹20,000 INR at a hackathon hosted by HCLTech.

certifications: Introduction to Generative AI [Google Cloud Skills Boost]

hobbies_details.sports: Doesn't actively play sports but follows cricket and F1 as a neutral supporter. Plays badminton occasionally.
hobbies_details.music: Prefers songs with great lyrics. Believes most modern songs lack lyrical depth.
hobbies_details.art: Not creative in drawing or painting, but appreciates photography as an art form. Dislikes taking many photos.
hobbies_details.diy_projects: Automates processes on his laptop in free time. Built a self-balancing bot and completed a Ministry of Heavy Industries course on Industrial robots.
hobbies_details.travel_preferences: Prefers beaches over mountains. Dreams of traveling the world.
hobbies_details.gaming: Hasn't played games for a long time but excels when fully engaged in a game.
hobbies_details.reading: Has read books like 'Train to Pakistan', 'The Clocks' (Agatha Christie), 'Can't Hurt Me', and all Chetan Bhagat books.
hobbies_details.cooking: Excellent cook who enjoys preparing Indian dishes and experimenting with various cuisines. Self-described foodie who enjoys food anytime, anywhere.
hobbies_details.collecting: Maintains a modest currency collection from approximately 10 countries.

cognitive_abilities.intelligence: High IQ with excellent problem-solving skills and ability to process complex ideas.
cognitive_abilities.memory: Forgets things he doesn't consider important. Has good working memory for tasks.
cognitive_abilities.attention: Can get distracted easily if not fully engaged. Not impulsive but easily distracted.
cognitive_abilities.critical_thinking: Strong analytical abilities and logical reasoning.
cognitive_abilities.creativity: Considered creative and original by peers with ability to think outside the box.
cognitive_abilities.learning_speed: Learns new information and skills very quickly with some challenges in long-term retention.
cognitive_abilities.decision_making: Has difficulty making decisions but has a high risk appetite.

emotional_intelligence.self_awareness: Emotionally strong with good understanding of own emotions.
emotional_intelligence.self_regulation: Very controlled with great management of emotions.
emotional_intelligence.motivation: Recently developed stronger drive to set and achieve goals.
emotional_intelligence.empathy: Shows somewhat lower empathy and sensitivity to others' emotions.
emotional_intelligence.social_skills: Great social and communication skills with good conflict resolution abilities.
emotional_intelligence.resilience: High emotional resilience with strong ability to recover from setbacks and high tolerance for frustration.

mental_health.stress_management: Doesn't get stressed easily. Requires good food to cope with stress.
mental_health.mood: Controlled and happy mood most of the time.
mental_health.self_esteem: High self-confidence despite feeling negative about physical appearance.
mental_health.sleep_patterns: Gets 8 hours of sleep but with irregular patterns. Remains active regardless of sleep quality.

personality_traits.openness: Extremely curious and open to new experiences.
personality_traits.conscientiousness: Organized and goal-oriented but tends to make last-minute submissions.
personality_traits.extraversion: Comfortable in social situations, equally enjoys social interactions and solitude.
personality_traits.agreeableness: Compassionate and cooperative but may hesitate if too much help is required.
personality_traits.emotional_stability: Very stable with good handling of negative emotions.

resilience_factors.perseverance: Very high ability to push through challenges in professional settings.
resilience_factors.adaptability: Adapts easily and quickly to changing circumstances.
resilience_factors.problem_solving: Strongly focused on addressing issues with solutions.
resilience_factors.optimism: Mostly positive outlook that maintains hope in adversity.

lifestyle.shopping_preferences: Likes expensive brands but dresses simply.
lifestyle.social_life: Has a small, supportive friend group (especially Hrishikesh, Shanmukh and Rajashekar). Enjoys dinners with friends.
lifestyle.time_management: Struggles with time management but actively working to improve.
lifestyle.living_situation: Lives in a small apartment with parents.
lifestyle.transportation_interests: Loves high-end sedans, SUVs, muscle cars, and sporty vehicles. Aspires to own several.
lifestyle.financial_habits: Tends to spend all pocket money by month's end.

relationship_status: Never been in a romantic relationship. Maintains good relationships with family members and friends.

travel_history.residence_history: Has lived in Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Tamil Nadu during different years of schooling.

work_habits.work_style: Can work both independently and collaboratively. Highly cooperative and comfortable in collaborative environment.
work_habits.leadership_experience: Good at leading, guiding and managing a team proved in various occasions in the university coursework

personal_details.fitness: Fit (does running & gym at irregular intervals)

personal_values.political_views: Feels Indian politicians are not effective. Thinks he can do better if in power or as a consultant.
personal_values.environmental_beliefs: Believes society needs drastic improvement in environmental conservation.
personal_values.philosophical_beliefs: Believes in working towards what you like and remembering the people you do it for.
personal_values.cultural_preferences: Fan of Indian cultures and somewhat traditional.

personal_goals.short_term: Work, start a business, scale it and attain financial freedom.
personal_goals.long_term: Pursue M.Tech/MSc and MBA, obtain a pilot's license, own a good mansion, build generational wealth and contribute to philanthropic work.

technical_interests.current_focus: Large Language Models, Computer Vision, and AI applications
technical_interests.continuous_learning: Frequently visits labs.google.com and stays updated with the latest technology tools and advancements
technical_interests.coding_activities: Actively engaged in DSA (Data Structures and Algorithms) practice and web development
technical_interests.community_contributions: Introduced Perplexity to SASTRA students, regularly shares tech resources with peers

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: I specialize in AI/ML technologies including Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision. I'm currently exploring Large Language Models; web development using React, Flask, and MySQL.

faqs.question: What are your educational qualifications?
faqs.answer: I'm currently in my 3rd year of B.Tech in Computer Science and Business Systems at SASTRA University. I'm also pursuing a Minor Specialization Degree in 'Innovation and Entrepreneurship'.

faqs.question: What are your current technical interests?
faqs.answer: I'm deeply interested in AI advancements, particularly in Large Language Models. I actively follow the latest tech developments and frequently explore resources like labs.google.com. I'm also enhancing my DSA skills and web development capabilities.

faqs.question: What are some of your DIY projects?
faqs.answer: I enjoy automating processes on my laptop in my free time. I've built a self-balancing bot and completed a Ministry of Heavy Industries course on Industrial robots. I plan to automate my entire home in the future.

faqs.question: How would you describe your personality?
faqs.answer: I'm extremely curious and open to new experiences. I have high self-confidence and emotional stability. I adapt quickly to changing circumstances and I'm strongly focused on finding solutions to problems. I'm comfortable in social situations but equally enjoy solitude.
